did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Scrapbooks of the Peralta Land Grant Case 1895-1899
did.abstract: Scrapbooks of newspaper clippings, 1895-1899, concerning the Peralta Land Grant case. Most are written by Walter B. Stevens, 1848-1939. Stevens was a journalist and a St. Louis Globe-Democrat that covered the Peralta Land Grant case. Some clippings are present concerning other land grants. Also included are 88 pages of typescripts of news articles; some are the articles in the scrapbook.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Scrapbooks of the Peralta Land Grant Case (AZ 108). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Journalist, St. Louis Globe-Democrat; covered the Peralta Land Grant case.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks of newspaper clippings, 1895-1899, concerning the Peralta Land Grant case. Most are written by Stevens. Some clippings are present concerning other land grants. Also included are 88 pages of typescripts of news articles; some are the articles in the scrapbook.

relatedmaterial.p: The following collections also contain information about the Peralta Grant: AZ 107, AZ 109, AZ 110, and AZ 111.
